genre: harem comedy, ecchi, slice of life drama
premise: A broke perverted man struggling with yakuza debt must navigate living with three curvy women competing for his affection while taking on increasingly absurd odd jobs to survive in modern Tokyo

visual_style.aesthetic: hyperrealistic character designs with anime influence

secondary: contrast between poverty (muted tones) and luxury (saturated colors)

location.primary: Small two-bedroom apartment in working-class Tokyo district
location.atmosphere: cramped urban living, financial stress contrasted with moments of absurd comedy

world_setting.socioeconomic: working poor, debt culture, yakuza underground economy
cultural_elements: harem anime tropes subverted by poverty

tone.balance: 70% comedy, 20% ecchi fan service, 10% dramatic tension

themes: male wish fulfillment undermined by poverty
absurd jobs as escape from reality

narrative_structure.pacing: fast-paced comedy with moments of introspection

story_arcs.description: Takeshi owes 5 million yen, must pay monthly installments or face consequences
Yuki, Mei, and Rina escalate their pursuit of Takeshi while he tries to exploit the situation
Each episode features increasingly absurd jobs that complicate Takeshi's life
Takeshi's attempts to exploit living with attractive women backfire comedically

protagonist.name: Takeshi Sato
protagonist.archetype: desperate loser with hidden heart of gold

visual_direction.character_design: photorealistic anime style, detailed facial features, realistic body proportions with anime eyes
visual_direction.environment_design: realistic Tokyo locations with anime lighting and composition

fan_service_guidelines.clothing: revealing but not explicit, tight-fitting outfits, strategic camera angles
fan_service_guidelines.situations: comedic accidental exposure, bath scenes, wardrobe malfunctions
fan_service_guidelines.boundaries: suggestive but not pornographic, comedy-focused ecchi

comedy_visual_language.exaggeration: shocked expressions, sweat drops, speed lines
comedy_visual_language.visual_gags: nosebleeds, steam from embarrassment, hearts and flowers
comedy_visual_language.slapstick: physical comedy reactions, getting hit by objects
